summary: Removes Intro video, menu fog, Bethesda logo & interactive loading screens.
descriptionHtml:
Long story short - speeds up your startup and loading between instances by replacingÂ  assets with blank stuff.

Removes Intro video, menu fog, Bethesda logo & interactive loading screens.

Not lore friendly - you will miss hints and lore description from loading screens.
